snippet: The N.H.L. and the players union negotiated for the first time since Oct. 18. But the league was unequivocal in saying that the Winter Classic, the league’s signature event, would remain canceled.
abstract: NHL and players union negotiate for first time since Oct. 18, but league is unequivocal in saying that the Winter Classic, league’s signature event, will remain canceled.
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. and the players union negotiated for the first time since Oct. 18. But the league was unequivocal in saying that the Winter Classic, the league’s signature event, would remain canceled.

headline.seo: N.H.L. and Union Resume Labor Talks; League Insists Winter Classic Is Off
headline.main: N.H.L. Resumes Labor Talks, but Insists Classic Is Off
